did.unittitle: Isaac Norris and Thomas Griffitts account books

scopecontent.p: This volume contains Thomas Griffitts daybook, 1722-1724, comprising 114 pages of the volume. Following that is Isaac Norris's daybook, 1733, comprising 42 pages. Finally is Isaac Norris's cash account of Fairhill, 1742-1755, comprising 100 pages.
